channel.title: Posts on Renji
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Renji

item.title: Chinese Cabbage-collapsing cabbage in Suzhou
item.description: Everyday Sunson Asian markets put baskets of “Chinese cabbage” at the entrance of the store. It should be the most consumable vegetable for Chinese. Why do the Chinese love these cabbage so much? Because it has a special bond, especially it is rooted in Wu (吴) culture.

item.title: Wildflowers of Hua Hill in early Autumn
item.description: It’s late autumn now in New Zealand, which reminds me of autumn and things back home.

item.title: Leaf-colonising Bacteria Colony Phenotype
item.description: Here are some bacteria I am working with. I will try to update some interesting info about these bacteria.

item.title: 103-year-old Hospital finally Returns to Normal
item.description: Medical staff escorted a critically ill patient to a hospital. The medical staff will follow the ambulance to the hospital where the patient is received and monitor the patient’s condition at any time. China Youth Daily. Photo by·Jiaxing Wang
